None.Name: Corpse Gathering
None.Description: Gathers energy from nearby corpses equal to their former maximum life points in order to enable a freezing aura.

None.Name: Tainted Ice Shock
None.Description:
Once at least 1000
life points have been stored the
building will start to convert them in
order to cover its surroundings in ice.
Every hostile unit within a 25m radius
that remains exposed to the ice for at
least 5 seconds will be frozen for 25
seconds. After the effect wears off,
targets will be immune against Freeze
for a while. For each frozen enemy 200
stored life points will be used up.
